name: 墨子
bio_short: 中国战国时期的哲学家、科学家和军事工程师，墨家学派的创始人。他在《墨经》中对光学（小孔成像）、力学和几何学进行了开创性的科学观察。
bio_short_en: A Chinese philosopher, scientist, and military engineer during the Warring States period, and founder of Mohism. He recorded pioneering scientific observations on optics (pinhole imaging), mechanics, and geometry in the 'Mojing'.
